Data Persistence Module

class src.data_persistence.DataPersistence(dbname: object, user: object, password: object, host: object, port: object)[source]

Bases: object

Handles database operations for the Habit Tracker application.

This class manages the connection to the PostgreSQL database and provides methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting habits and their completions.

create_tables()[source]

Create the necessary tables if they don’t exist.

delete_habit(habit_id)[source]

Remove a habit and its completions from the database.

Parameters:

habit_id (int) – The ID of the habit to be deleted.

load_habits()[source]

Load all habits from the database.

Returns:

A list of Habit objects.

Return type:

list

save_habit(habit)[source]

Save a new habit to the database.

Parameters:

habit (Habit) – The habit object to be saved.

Returns:

The ID of the newly saved habit.

Return type:

int

update_habit(habit)[source]

Update an existing habit in the database.

Parameters:

habit (Habit) – The habit object to be updated.
